short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A scam warner that will populate potential suspicious websites with warning screens

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Protect yourself and others from falling victim to online refund scams with the Scam Warning Chrome Extension. Our powerful tool is designed to provide you with real-time warnings and essential information about potential scam websites, ensuring you stay safe while browsing the internet. This application is also geared towards the older folks who can get manipulated more easily.

Key Features:

1. Instant Scam Detection: Scam Warning actively scans popular websites for potential scam indicators and alerts you with a clear warning message when suspicious activity is detected. Stay one step ahead of scammers and safeguard your personal information.

2. Report Scams: We link a secure FTC link to report refund scams and protect others.

Join the Scam Warning community today and become a part of the fight against online scams. By installing our extension, you not only protect yourself but also contribute to a safer online environment for everyone.

Don't let scammers catch you off guard. Install Scam Warning now and browse the internet with confidence and peace of mind!
